creator: Metajoy
descriptionHtml:
Knock knock! Jigsaw puzzles delivery! Welcome to the Jigsaw Album! Before we start to explore,

—What was the best game you played when you were young? Jigsaw should be it!
—Missing that old time? Get ready to find the memory back with Jigsaw Album!
—Feeling lonely when getting older?Jigsaw Album will be your best company!

How to Play:

—Play with classic Jigsaw rules. Place pieces to finish the puzzle and reveal what’s hidden behind.
—Rotation mode is more tricky basically.
—Adjust the difficulty by selecting the amount of pieces.
—Claim more rewards in Milestone with trophies you own.

Features:

—Open the “Album”, you can find various of HIGH QUALITY pictures to solve and relax.Choose from a variety of categories such as Buildings, Stuffed Toys, Hand Crafts, Scenery, Cat and Dog, Paintings, Countryside and others.
—Turn to page “Collections”, you can build up your own collection by completing each puzzle.
—The next page is “Daily Login”, claim your rewards by daily login and win the ultimate gift by logging in in a row.
—Challenge yourself and beat your best score by completing the “Daily Free Jigsaw Picture” within the limited time.
—Follow Milestone to record your every steps you make to become a REAL JIGSAW MASTER and claim more rewards with the trophies you own.
—Don’t worry if you get lost, use “Hints” to help you pass. I’m sure you can nail it!
—Up to 440 puzzle pieces. The more pieces you choose, the more challenging it will be!
—Rotation mode. Turn on rotation, make the game more tricky!
—Customized backgrounds. Choose your favorite color to play with for a better gaming experience.
—Play whenever and wherever you want. You can play offline after downloading!
—Share your friends with what you work on and invite them to join you.
—Professional support team. View the FAQ list whenever you want and contact us if you need further help.

Come and create your own Jigsaw Album!

—Don’t worry if you get lost, use “Hints” to help you pass. I’m sure you can nail it!
—Up to 440 puzzle pieces. The more pieces you choose, the more challenging it will be!
—Rotation mode. Turn on rotation, make the game more tricky!
—Customized backgrounds. Choose your favorite color to play with for a better gaming experience.
—Play whenever and wherever you want. You can play offline after downloading!
—Share your friends with what you work on and invite them to join you.
—Professional support team. View the FAQ list whenever you want and contact us if you need further help.

Come and create your own Jigsaw Album!

—Follow the classic Jigsaw gameplay rules. Place pieces to finish the puzzle and reveal what’s hidden behind.

—Turn to page “Collections”, you can build up your own collection by completing each puzzle.
